text: aprakaram ninre raksitav ninne terannetukkukayum, svapnavarttakalute vyakhyanattil ninn ninakkavan pathippiccutarikayum, ninre melum ya'aîkhub kutumbattinre melum avanre anugrahannal avan niraverrukayum ceyyunnatanâ€Œ. mump ninre rant pitakkalaya ibrahiminreyum isakhinreyum karyattil atavan niraverriyat pealettanne. tirccayayum ninre raksitav sarvvajnanum yuktimanumakunnu
